name: Excavation/Trench to Correct Line and Level
Subgrade in Trench Tested and Passed
Ducts Installed as Per IFC Drawings
Any Additional Ducts not on IFC Drawing
Ducts Installed to Correct Line and Level
Thermal Bedding Under Ducts as Required
Thermal Bedding Backfilled to Correct Level
Compaction of Thermal Bedding as Per Agreed Methodology and Passed
Marking Tape Installed Over Ducts Correctly
Ducts and Backfill Checked and Accepted
